name: Sai Teja Kodali
summary: Full Stack Web Developer with knowledge in Angular, Java, AWS, and MySQL, committed to generating efficient, robust and quality aesthetic digital solutions to satisfy business objectives and optimize the user experience. I stand out for my creative problem-solving capacity, self-taught initiative with ease of learning, adaptability to new technologies and enthusiasm for challenging projects..
description: I am Sai Teja Kodali I have knowledge and experience in Backend and Frontend environments and languages, I am always studying and practicing new things that add and complement my professional profile. The discipline of never stopping learning is one of my pillars, I am someone who believes that the best way to learn is to dare by doing, so I always have a project in mind and in process to apply new knowledge, I love code challenges and UI designs to replicate.

I am passionate about learning and applying design patterns, algorithms, flowcharts, web accessibility, frameworks and libraries, among others; and I love working with people who pursue similar ideals, I excel in collaborative projects, learning quickly and teaching, always willing to lend a hand, adding my impeccable problem solving and adaptability.
Thank you very much for your interest in this portfolio. I invite you to continue exploring it ðŸ˜‡

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Worked as a Full Stack Developer for over a year
responsibilities: Built user-interactive web pages using ES6 Typescript, and Angular 7, Angular CLI, Webpack, HTML5, TypeScript, SASS, and CSS3.
Developed and maintained enterprise-level Java applications using Java 11, JavaServer Faces (JSF), and Java Enterprise Edition (Java EE).
Implemented customer side validations using Angular and created services on UI for storing and retrieving data from UI to the backend.
Was under migration of the project converting angular components and updating router Modules. Implemented the complete set up with configuration file changes.
Utilized JSF component libraries and custom components to enhance user experience and improve application functionality.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: This portfolio! I did both design and programming, applying knowledge in Angular, SCSS, UX usability, among others, in a personal challenge to do it from design to implementation. It is constantly improving.
